Mons Bassouamina (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 28 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1998) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agbara otu egwuregwu bọọlụ na Championnat National 2 Bastia-Borgo
A mụrụ ya na mba France, ọ na-agbara ndị otu mba Congo bọọlụ.
Na Jenụwarị 2019, a gbazinyere Bassouamina na Boulogne site na Nancy.
A mụrụ ya na France, Bassouamina bụ onye Congo. Ọ bụ onye ntorobịa mba ụwa maka France
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ nọchite anya ndị otu mba Congo maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi na Machị 2022. Ọ malitere na Congo na mmeri enyi na enyi 3–1 nke Zambia n'ụbọchị 25nke ọnwa Machị, afọ 2022.
